categories: Category:Star Wars: Battlefront II voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Lethal Alliance voice actors

nodes.text:
Joyce Kurtz (born June 25, 1958) is a voice actor for the Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike and Star Wars: Battlefront II video games. She provided the voice for Princess Leia Organa.
She is the official "audio double" for the character played by Carrie Fisher.
She also provided additional voices for the 2006 video game Star Wars: Lethal Alliance.
